exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False x : nat l : x < p x0 : nat H0 : x0 < p Unable to unify "Zp ⊕ ?M1800 = ?M1800" with "exist (fun x : nat => x < p) (rem (rem 1 p * x) p) (div_rem_spec2 (rem 1 p * x) Hp) = exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x l".

original: intros x. unfold Op. rewrite Zp_one. apply Zp_plus_zero.
